title: Only one county
comment: I live in the corner of two states and three counties, only able to choose one state and one county. No option for it to follow via GPS. App is antiquated. One star is being generous

title: Liar's!!!!!
comment: They said that a severe thunderstorm is going to happen on June 10th at like four something and right now it's 6:10!!!! I didn't even see a thunderstorm .What a lie

title: LOVE IT
comment: IF THE WONES THAT MADE THIS APP I WISH YOU CLOUD AD ON THIS APP A WEATHER RADIO BY THE STATE OF THAT CLANLEN AS A NEW UPDAET TO THIS APP I LOVE THE APP BUT IT DO NOT TLALL THE CITY OR THE NAME OF TOWN THAT ARE ONDER THE BALD WEATHER JUST THE CLANLEN THAT IS IN THE STATE THAT IS IN U.S.A. AND I LOVE IT BE COLES IT IS 100% FREE TO GET THIS APP AND I LOVE WEATHER ALOLET

title: Doesn't work
comment: I'm writing to tell you the new version doesn't work eather. Click open nothing but a white blank screen.  The widget all it says is widget loading. Has really done anything.
I just posted a new version with a fix for the refresh not working on Jelly Bean and newer. Does that fix it?

title: Ehh
comment: Its an okay app but I cant seem to figure out why its not letting me view example of problems or sending me notifications about the alerts I'm getting. Just an idea, for entire state you should put the county next to it for easier viewing.
It doesn't do notifications yet, that's in the description.  That is planned eventually.  Maybe in the next few weeks, since I'm planning to work on it some more this next week.
